ValidationRule.description: Ensures the primary owner of a product is in the household to which the product is linked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && ( NOT( Household__c = FinServ__PrimaryOwner__r.Household_Lookup__c ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Household__r.Type, "Trust" )) && NOT( ISPICKVAL( Household__r.FinServ__Status__c, "Inactive" )) ) && NOT( $Permission.ValidationBypass ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( FinServ__Status__c, "Closed"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The primary owner must be in the household to which this product is linked. Ensure their relationship in the household is marked as the primary group.
